personalInfo.clubAffl: Wachesaw Plantation Club (Murrells Inlet, South Carolina)

tourBios.carHigh:
2012: Rookie on the Web.com Tour, making five starts and one cut (T62). 2011: Only PGA TOUR-related start of his career came at the U.S. Open, where he missed the cut.

Has seven wins and two money titles on the NGA Hooters Tour Carolina Series.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Big South Conference Player of the Year in 2009...Won Big South individual title in 2009...Academic All American in 2007 and 2009...Third-team All American in 2009...Was Carolinas Junior champion.
tourBios.personal: Roomed with Dustin Johnson during college golf trips...Was home-schooled in high school...Golf instructor is Mike Schroder...Earliest golf memory was watching Payne Stewart win the 1999 U.S. Open at Pinehurst...Biggest thrill in golf was playing in his first U.S. Open at Congressional CC...Biggest thrill outside golf is meeting his fiance...Favorite courses to play are Kingsbarn in Scotland, Inverness CC, Colonial CC and Pinehurst No. 2...Never travels without chapstick...Changes his ball mark every day...Favorite website is facebook.com and pandora.com...Favorite college teams are Coastal Carolina and South Carolina...Favorite pro teams are the Dallas Cowboys, Atlanta Braves and Miami Heat...Favorite TV shows is "The Big Bang Theory."...Favorite movies are "Dumb & Dumber" and "Forrest Gump"...Favorite athletes to watch were Troy Aikman, Emmitt Smith and Michael Jordan and now LeBron James... Favorite vacation spots are the Caribbean and the Disney theme parks...Favorite gadget is the iPhone, while his favorite apps are Twitter, PGA TOUR and ESPN...Keeps peanut butter and jelly sanwiches and Nature Valley granola bars in his golf bag...Oldest club in bag is his putter...Dream foursome would be Payne Stewart, George Bush and Steve Spurrier...Nobody knows "I am a beer snob."...Bucket list includes seeing a Major League Baseball game in every stadium...Supports charities Connect for 10 and a local animal shelter...First-tee introduction song would be "Dirt Road Anthem" by Jason Aldean...Would like to trade places with Jerry Jones "So I could fix all of the Cowboys' problems."...Twitter account is @zbyrdgolf.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T9 at the Florida Qualifying Tournament, with rounds of 66-69-70-66. Best season finish was a T8 at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open supported by rounds of 69-68-68-69, two strokes behind champion Michael Letzig.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Big South Conference Player of the Year in 2009...Won Big South individual title in 2009...Academic All American in 2007 and 2009...Third-team All American in 2009...Was Carolinas Junior champion.
tourBios.personal: Roomed with Dustin Johnson during college golf trips...Was home-schooled in high school...Golf instructor is Mike Schroder...Earliest golf memory was watching Payne Stewart win the 1999 U.S. Open at Pinehurst...Biggest thrill in golf was playing in his first U.S. Open at Congressional CC...Biggest thrill outside golf was meeting his fiance...Favorite courses to play are Kingsbarn in Scotland, Inverness CC, Colonial CC and Pinehurst No. 2...Never travels without chapstick...Changes his ball mark every day...Favorite website is facebook.com and pandora.com...Favorite college teams are Coastal Carolina and South Carolina...Favorite pro teams are the Dallas Cowboys, Atlanta Braves and Miami Heat...Favorite TV shows is "The Big Bang Theory."...Favorite movies are "Dumb & Dumber" and "Forrest Gump."...Favorite athletes to watch were Troy Aikman, Emmitt Smith and Michael Jordan and now LeBron James...Favorite vacation spots are the Caribbean and the Disney theme parks...Favorite gadget is the iPhone, while his favorite apps are Twitter, PGA TOUR and ESPN...Keeps peanut butter and jelly sanwiches and Nature Valley granola bars in his golf bag...Oldest club in bag is his putter...Dream foursome would be Payne Stewart, George Bush and Steve Spurrier...Nobody knows "I am a beer snob."...Bucket list includes seeing a Major League Baseball game in every stadium...Supports charities Connect for 10 and a local animal shelter...First-tee introduction song would be "Dirt Road Anthem" by Jason Aldean...Would like to trade places with Jerry Jones, "So I could fix all of the Cowboys' problems."...Twitter is @zbyrdgolf.

dyn.dynBios: He tore his ACL in college.
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T8th in 2015 at the SIGA Dakota Dunes Open.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 78th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
